## PageVirtualScrollPagingComponent class

Paging that uses scrolling to load data

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PageVirtualScrollPagingComponent extends VirtualScrollPagingAbstractComponent<PageVirtualScrollPagingOptions> implements PageVirtualScrollPaging
```
